LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_AssignPawn: Assign this {0} to be owned by a specific colonist.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_SelectRegisterApparel: Opens the dialog so you can register favorite apparels.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_SelectRegisterPowerArmor: Opens the dialog so you can register favorite Power Armors.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_WearRegisterApparel: Wear favorite. Remove apparels you can no longer wear and store them in a locker. Change apparel faster than usual. ...Because it is my favorite.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_NoRegister: Favorite is not registered in the {0}.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_InCompleteWearOrStore: Not all favorite apparels are stored in {0} or {1} is not wearing them.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_NoPath: There is no path to the {0}.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_RemoveRegisterApparel: Remove favorite.If alternative apparels are stored in the locker, wear it.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_WearFavoritePowerArmor: Wear favorite Power Armors. The apparels you can no longer wear will be stored in own locker.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_WearFavoritePowerArmorNotLink: Wear favorite Power Armors. Drop the apparels that you can no longer wear.
LanguageData.EKAI_Desc_RemoveFavoritePowerArmor: Remove favorite Power Armors.If own locker stores alternative apparels, wear it.
LanguageData.EKAI_ApparelRemoved: Hitpoints of {0} worn by {1} is not within the selected allowed range. Removed from favourites.
LanguageData.EKAI_AllowedHPRange: Dont return apparel that is not within the selected hitpoint-range
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_NoPathWithItem: There is no path between the {0} and the {1}.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_Duplication: Can't register because the body parts and layers overlap.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_DuplicationWithApparelRegisterd: Colonist can't wear it at the same time as the apparels registered in own {0} because the body parts and layers overlap. \nTherefore, if you register as a favorite, colonist will change apparels unintentionally.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_CantDropFromContainer: The owner is changing apparels, so can't remove apparels from the {0} at the moment.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_UnknownDetail: This apparel was favorite, but missing now.
LanguageData.EKAI_Msg_CantComplete: Your {3} can't finish loading the {2}(owner:{0}) because some items became unavailable.({1})
